name: part_009
file: tmp_【#超ゲマズ2_day1】hololive GAMERS fes. 超超超超ゲーマーズ2【チラ見せ】 [DsZz2bIg-Ho]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: The hololive Gamers members (Fubuki, Mio, Okayu, Korone) are on stage, greeting the audience and reminding them to stay hydrated.
On-screen text introduces the 'CheerSPOT' collaboration for support advertisements.
The members talk about the support advertisements displayed within the venue.
Fubuki announces the release of life-sized figures and Okayu/Korone share their excitement.
On-screen text shows Okayu and Korone's figures, and Fubuki explains the pre-order benefits.
On-screen text shows Fubuki and Mio's figures, with Fubuki announcing a limited-time additional pre-order period.
Fubuki introduces sponsored collaboration goods (popcorn and canned chicken) from 'Canble'.
The members mention the live viewing in Korea and greet the Korean fans.
Korone introduces the first game, 'Bibittar', and its title appears on the screen.
Fubuki explains the rules of 'Bibittar' while the rule screen is displayed, and then prepares to summon a giant controller with the audience.

subtitles.original: あ、入口でもらえるうちわ、皆さんゲットしましたか？
subtitles.english: Oh, did everyone get the fan they give out at the entrance?

subtitles.original: もらった方ー？
subtitles.english: Who got one?

subtitles.original: もらったうちわも使って、熱中症対策万全にして...
subtitles.english: Use the fan you got to take full precautions against heatstroke...

subtitles.original: ...最後まで楽しんでください！
subtitles.english: ...and please enjoy until the end!

subtitles.original: まだまだ続きますよ！
subtitles.english: It's still going!

subtitles.original: 超ゲマズ、我らゲマズを応援したいっていう声が多かったので...
subtitles.english: Since there were many voices saying they want to support us Gamers at Chou Gemazu...

subtitles.original: ...今回イベントでチアスポットさんとのコラボをすることになりました！
subtitles.english: ...we've decided to collaborate with CheerSPOT for this event!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 誰でも簡単に、好きなアーティストの場所に白上たちゲマズの応援広告を出すことができます！
subtitles.english: Anyone can easily put up support advertisements for us Gamers, including Shirakami, at their favorite artist's location!

subtitles.original: これすごい！
subtitles.english: This is amazing!

subtitles.original: 会場内もね、これあの、なんと！ね、スポットが我らになってまして、びっくりしました。
subtitles.english: Inside the venue too, what! The spots have become us, I was surprised.

subtitles.original: そうなんだ。
subtitles.english: Is that so.

subtitles.original: 見てないの！？
subtitles.english: You haven't seen them!?

subtitles.original: 見てたよ！見てたよ、あのパネルのやつか。
subtitles.english: I saw them! I saw them, you mean those panels.

subtitles.original: そうそう。見に来てない方は会場内に確かあったと思いますので、よかったら見てください。
subtitles.english: Right, right. I think they were in the venue for those who haven't seen them yet, so please check them out.

subtitles.original: はい、そしてさらに、さいたまスーパーアリーナ会場内で、等身大を初披露！
subtitles.english: Yes, and furthermore, in the Saitama Super Arena venue, for the first time we're revealing life-sized figures!

subtitles.original: 3月のEXPO会場で発表されましたフブミオ等身大に続きまして、おかころフィギュアも発売予定となっております！
subtitles.english: Following the FubuMio life-sized figures announced at the EXPO in March, OkaKoro figures are also scheduled to be released!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay! We did it!

subtitles.original: やったー！事前の告知配信ではさ、なかったらおかゆん毛玉なんじゃないかって言ったんですけど、ちゃんと揃ってました！
subtitles.english: Yay! In the pre-announcement stream, I said if they weren't there, Okayun would just be a hairball, but they're all here!

subtitles.original: 揃ってましたね！めちゃめちゃ可愛かったです。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: They're all here! They were so cute. Thank you.

subtitles.original: そしてまた、本日から新作のフィギュアがデザインココから受注開始です！
subtitles.english: And also, from today, new figures from Design Coco are open for pre-orders!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！可愛い！
subtitles.english: Yay! Cute!

subtitles.original: イベント開催を記念して、8月7日までにココストアで予約してくれた方には、特典のステッカーをプレゼントされるそうです。
subtitles.english: To commemorate the event, those who pre-order at Coco Store by August 7th will receive a bonus sticker.

subtitles.original: 可愛すぎる。
subtitles.english: Too cute.

subtitles.original: やっぱり白上とミオも欲しいなーと思った、そこのあなた！あなた！あなたー！
subtitles.english: For you there who thought "I want Shirakami and Mio too!" You! You! You!

subtitles.original: なんと超ゲマズ2の開催を記念して、期間限定でフブミオ追加予約を開始じゃー！
subtitles.english: What, to commemorate the holding of Chou Gemazu 2, we're starting additional pre-orders for FubuMio for a limited time!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 逃したよっていうのもね、あの、何個かエゴサで見かけましたので、これを機にぜひともご予約お願いします！
subtitles.english: I saw several comments on Ego Search saying "I missed it," so please take this opportunity to pre-order!

subtitles.original: そして最後に、カンブル様による協賛企業グッズ...
subtitles.english: And finally, we have the introduction of the sponsored company goods by Canble...

subtitles.original: ...超超超超ポップコーンと超超超超グリルチキンのご紹介でございます！
subtitles.english: ...the Chou Chou Chou Chou Popcorn and Chou Chou Chou Chou Grilled Chicken!

subtitles.original: 今回のイベントのキービジュアルが前面に出たデザインとなってるとのことです。
subtitles.english: It's said that the design features the key visual of this event prominently.

subtitles.original: ポップコーンは税込み1000円で、缶詰めは税込み1500円での販売でございます。
subtitles.english: Popcorn is 1000 yen including tax, and the canned food is sold for 1500 yen including tax.

subtitles.original: ポップコーンは塩キャラメル味、缶詰めはグリルチキン味になってます。
subtitles.english: The popcorn is salted caramel flavor, and the canned food is grilled chicken flavor.

subtitles.original: トレカもついてる！
subtitles.english: It even comes with a trading card!

subtitles.original: こちらのグッズは他のグッズと異なり、受注生産ではなく、数量限定商品のため...
subtitles.english: Unlike other goods, these are not made-to-order but are limited quantity items, so...

subtitles.original: ...お早めにゲットしてください！
subtitles.english: ...please get them early!

subtitles.original: 集合アクリルパネルも含めて、事後でしか購入できないグッズですので、皆さんぜひチェックしてください。
subtitles.english: Including the collective acrylic panel, these are goods that can only be purchased after the fact, so everyone please check them out.

subtitles.original: なんと、ちなみに今回は韓国でライブビューイングもやってるそうですよ。韓国の皆様、アンニョンハセヨ！
subtitles.english: What, by the way, it seems they are also doing a live viewing in Korea this time. Everyone in Korea, Annyeonghaseyo!

subtitles.original: アンニョンハセヨ！
subtitles.english: Annyeonghaseyo!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: ではですね、色々ご紹介も終わりましたので、早速最初に行うゲームタイトルを発表しちゃいましょう！
subtitles.english: Well then, now that we've finished various introductions, let's announce the title of the first game we'll play right away!

subtitles.original: 行きますよ、せーの！
subtitles.english: Here we go, one, two!

subtitles.original: こちら！
subtitles.english: This!

subtitles.original: ビビッター！
subtitles.english: Bibittar!

subtitles.original: こちらルールは超簡単。
subtitles.english: The rules for this are super simple.

subtitles.original: ミニゲームに対し、タイミングよくボタンを押して、ギリギリで止めるだけ。
subtitles.english: For the mini-game, just press the button with good timing and stop at the very last second.

subtitles.original: はい、我らのですね、度胸を試す究極のビビリチェッカーゲームとなっております。
subtitles.english: Yes, it's the ultimate chicken checker game to test our courage.

subtitles.original: よりギリギリを攻めると、クールの評価がもらえるそうです。
subtitles.english: It seems if you push it even closer to the limit, you get a "Cool" rating.

subtitles.original: 今回ですね、我ら個人戦でございます。
subtitles.english: This time, it's an individual battle for us.

subtitles.original: 一つのミニゲームに対し、二人がそれぞれ挑戦します。
subtitles.english: Two people will challenge each mini-game.

subtitles.original: 様々な組み合わせで合計6ゲーム、行わせていただきたいと思います。
subtitles.english: We'd like to play a total of 6 games in various combinations.

subtitles.original: こちらですね、我らのクールの合計数で1位を決めたいと思いますので、よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: We'll decide the winner based on our total number of "Cool" ratings, so please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: ではですね、ゲームを始める前に、なんと今回ですね、巨大コントローラーを用意してくれたということで...
subtitles.english: Well then, before starting the game, what, this time they've prepared a giant controller for us...

subtitles.original: はい、召喚しましょう。これでちょっと会場の皆さんも一緒に...
subtitles.english: Yes, let's summon it. With this, everyone in the venue together...

subtitles.original: 「出でよ、巨大コントローラー！」って叫んでくれると嬉しいです。できますか！？
subtitles.english: "Come forth, giant controller!" I'd be happy if you'd shout that. Can you do it!?
